topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551207ab63687234c62d0000#post_551207ab63687234c62d0000
Honestly I don't see the appeal of one-punch man at all.

If a character can overcome any obstacle without any effort then doesn't that mean there's no actual conflict?  To use an analogy wouldn't that be like making a tv show about superman where instead of fighting supervillains instead he is all the time fighting regular non-super power criminals such as pickpocketers?

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551208db6368725977410700#post_551208db6368725977410700
No you don't get it, THATS the premise.

One Punch man literally says "Having a over bearing power is pretty boring"

Really its supposed to be comical.

One Punch Man *Wants to fight someone stronger than him*

*But he cant* 

*And so he HATES IT* Because its boring.

Like I said its Comical. It really isn't supposed to be taken seriously.
